text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump The most informed president...somehow misses intel on covid19..and russian bounties on American soldiers. According to Trump..the people he hires are incompetent...wouldn't it make sense to look into why there was a problem in getting the info..on jobs...temporary reemployment.
